item.title: Nano_bristle_toothbrush_and_more
item.description: For over a quarter century, I’ve been brushing my teeth with all kinds of toothbrushes. I’ve tried your standard brands like Colgate, Braun, Crest and even the boutique brands you find at Wholefoods or natural health stores. I’ve even been a been a long time user of the Sonicare and Oral B brush systems. But then I discovered the brush that changed everything in 2022–the nano bristle brush that has 20,000 ultra soft nano strands that can really give you that squeaky clean smile.
